TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit KeyInfo extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 XML 數位簽章或 XML 加密 項目。

span.span: Represents an XML digital signature or XML encryption element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別表示 XML 數位簽章和加密中的重要資訊。The class represents key information in XML digital signing and encryption. 類別可讓您嵌入用意在於幫助識別所需的驗證或解密的 XML 文件的索引鍵的索引鍵的相關資訊。The class enables you to imbed key-related information intended to help identify the key necessary for validating or decrypting the XML document. 多個類型的索引鍵相關的資訊可以包含在單一; 每一種金鑰的相關資訊有相關聯的類別衍生自。Multiple types of key-related information can be included within a single ; each type of key-related information has an associated class derived from . 如需詳細資訊``項目，請參閱 XMLDSIG 規格，也就是可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C，或請參閱 XML 加密規格，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/ W3C。For more information about the `` element, see the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/, or see the XML encryption specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用物件時簽署表示通用資源識別元 (URI) 的資源。The following code example uses the object when signing a resource represented by a Universal Resource Identifier (URI). 此範例會將簽章儲存在新的檔案。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CPP/xmldsigdetach.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/CS/xmldsigdetach.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigDetached/VB/xmldsigdetach.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用物件時簽署 XML 文件。The following code example uses the object when signing an XML document. 此範例會將簽章儲存在新的檔案。This example saves the signature in a new file. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CPP/xmldsigenv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/CS/xmldsigenv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Cryptography.XML-XMLDsigEnvelope/VB/xmldsigenv.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用物件加密 XML 文件時。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此範例會將內嵌已加密的金鑰加密的 XML 文件中。This example embeds an encrypted key within the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例使用物件加密 XML 文件時。The following code example uses the object when encrypting an XML document. 此範例會將名稱對應至對稱金鑰，來識別要解密的方法。This example maps a name to a symmetric key to identify it to the decryption method. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 傳回 物件中 物件的列舉值。

span.span: Returns an enumerator of the objects in the object.

returns.span: 可用來逐一查看集合之 的子項目列舉值。

span.span: An enumerator of the subelements of that can be used to iterate through the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從相同的集合，同時取得兩個列舉值不一定需要傳回相同的重複項目。Two enumerators taken from the same collection at the same time are not necessarily required to return the same iteration. 一開始，列舉值必須位於集合中的第一個項目之前，必須由呼叫者在使用前先實作進階。Initially, the enumerator must be positioned before the first element of the collection and must be advanced by the caller of the implementation before use.
